name: Lego Run
description:
--- STILL IN DEVELOPMENT---

This is an early version of an endless runner made using LEGO pieces. Developed with Unreal Engine 5. Currently for Windows with a mobile version coming soon. There are definitely bugs which will be fixed but it is otherwise still playable. 

Controls: Left and Right Arrow to swap lanes. Space to jump. 

Bricks are from Mecabricks

Lego Font: https://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Legothick.htm

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/on-the-run-day-19
